location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Aboo [Ä€bu] to James Charles Edwards, Assistant Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Pelly's play and requesting a table of contents once all the scenes are complete.The letter also informs Edwards that he has sent him the title deeds for his plots of ground at Bushire, authorising him to sell his kit and Billiards table and enquiring whether his wine could be shipped to England.The reply to this letter can be found at Mss Eur F126/44, ff 160-161
